Restricted Skins.name: Tec-9 | Red Quartz
Restricted Skins.desc: It has been painted with metallic paint, using a crystallizing mask to create a pattern.
Restricted Skins.lore: Everyone wants to make an impact

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Sawed-Off | Amber Fade
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted by airbrushing transparent paints that fade together over a chrome base coat.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: This isn't just a weapon, it's a conversation piece - Imogen, Arms Dealer In Training

Mil-Spec Skins.name: Desert Eagle | Urban Rubble
Mil-Spec Skins.desc: It has been painted using a VariCamo patterned hydrographic.
Mil-Spec Skins.lore: Rebuilding only comes in the wake of destruction

Industrial Grade Skins.name: M4A4 | Urban DDPAT
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: By the time you're close enough to notice the pixels it's already too late

Industrial Grade Skins.name: P90 | Ash Wood
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been spray-painted freehand using twigs as stencils.

Industrial Grade Skins.name: MAC-10 | Candy Apple
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted solid colors in a red and black color scheme.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Great on cars, better on weapons

Industrial Grade Skins.name: P250 | Metallic DDPAT
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using an urban Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic over a metallic base coat.

Industrial Grade Skins.name: SCAR-20 | Carbon Fiber
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a carbon fiber hydrographic over a graphite base coat.
Industrial Grade Skins.lore: Just because I carried my team doesn't mean it wasn't a team effort - Rona Sabri, Rising Star

Industrial Grade Skins.name: MAG-7 | Metallic DDPAT
Industrial Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using an urban Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic over a metallic base coat.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: G3SG1 | Polar Camo
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using an arctic camo hydrographic.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Five-SeveN | Forest Night
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a forest camouflage hydrographic.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: The woods can be a dangerous place... never travel alone

Consumer Grade Skins.name: UMP-45 | Urban DDPAT
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been painted using a Digital Disruptive Pattern (DDPAT) hydrographic.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: By the time you're close enough to notice the pixels it's already too late

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Nova | Polar Mesh
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been spray-painted using mesh fencing and cardboard cutouts as stencils.
Consumer Grade Skins.lore: A predator is a predator, no matter the environment

Consumer Grade Skins.name: Dual Berettas | Colony
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has individual parts spray-painted khaki and grey.

Consumer Grade Skins.name: PP-Bizon | Urban Dashed
Consumer Grade Skins.desc: It has been spray-painted using short pieces of tape as stencils.
